sys_hub_flow.name: Flow 1 - Project Addition

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: If rejected by PM, "Project Status" is set to "No Bid"
Plans and Specs have been downloaded
download task assigned to admin department
Check with PM to see if Plant Division will work the job
If approved by PM, State i.e. Project Status is set to Takeoff
Wait till assigned estimator starts takeoff
Waiting for pre-takeoff review to be completed - pre-takeoff review participants field not empty
